attributes.action: Stop products which have been animal tested comming abroad from overseas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is an act of cruelty.
Although there is some law of england not to animal test , that doesnt stop products which have been animal tested from other countries entering the uk and selling in our supermarkets.
It's wrong how one law is for one , but not the other. 
Testing shouldnt be allowed at all.
Take a look at it this way - Your not allowed to have bombs in the uk , or bring in bombs from abroad - BUT WHY , why - it it with animal testing they dont allow to make , but other countries to make.
Simple as - this is wrong.
